summary: This bill, the Wireless Electric Vehicle Charging Grant Program Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of Transportation to establish a grant program for the construction, installation, and improvement of wireless charging infrastructure for electric vehicles. The program aims to promote electric vehicle adoption by addressing range anxiety and supporting technological advancements in wireless charging. Grants will be awarded to eligible entities like states, local governments, and transit agencies. The bill emphasizes geographic diversity, workforce development, and community engagement. Funds are authorized for the program to support sustainable technologies, enhance fleet electrification, and improve electric vehicle accessibility.
